settings.heading: FAQS
What is Louer Le Sac?
settings.paragraph: Louer Le Sac orLLSliterally means rent a bag in French.  We are an ultra luxury handbag company that allowsyouto have access to the most hard to get luxury bags at a fraction of the cost.

settings.heading: How does membership work?
settings.paragraph: Click here and it will take you to our how it works page with a step by step process to help you set up your account.

settings.heading: Is there a minimum period I have to sign up for?
settings.paragraph: Yes, there is a minimum 3 month commitment and we offer discounted rates for those who sign up for longer time periods.

settings.heading: What is the different between the membership tiers?
settings.paragraph: Each tier contains hand curated luxury items, each desirable in their own right.  Depending on the luxury goods “it” factor and its market value it will fall into either the Silver, Gold or Platinum Tier.

settings.heading: How long can I keep my luxury bag for?
settings.paragraph: Each luxury bag can be kept for a minimum of 30 days and a maximum of 90 days depending on the bag’s “it” factor and demand.

settings.heading: If I favorite a luxury bag that is currently not in stock, will I be made aware when it comes available?
settings.paragraph: All of our luxury bags are first come first serve, so we recommend to continue to check  our website to see if the bag you want is in stock.

settings.heading: Why does membership require my photo id?
settings.paragraph: Just as you expect LLS to deliver 100% authentic luxury goods, we need to ensure that our customers are who they say they are as well. We use a 3rd party identification tool to verify and confirm your government issued id card.

settings.heading: What type of insurance is offered?
settings.paragraph: While we insure the bags shipping to and from your home address, any and all damage cosmetic or otherwise will be charged to you in the event that damages occurs. We have an extensive 5 point inspection process and each bags condition is noted prior to shipping to you. We ship all our bags with inserts which should remain in the bag at all times.

settings.heading: What does premium insurance mean?
settings.paragraph: …. We still need to get an answer to this one

settings.heading: I love my LLS, is there a process that I can buy it?
settings.paragraph: While you have the bag in your possession, please send us an email indicating your desire to purchase the bag and we will let you know if the bag is available for purchase and what the cost will be.

settings.heading: How do I know that the buys are authentic?
settings.paragraph: All our bags are purchased directly from the retail store to ensure that all our items are 100% authentic.

settings.heading: GETTING STARTED
Where do you ship?
settings.paragraph: We ship anywhere in the continental USA, sorry Hawaii and Alaska.

settings.heading: Can I ship to a different address than is associated with my government issued ID?
settings.paragraph: No, to ensure that the bag gets delivered directly to you with the least amount of delays, we can only send to the address listed on your government id.

settings.heading: I moved, can I ship to my new address?
settings.paragraph: Yes! Just click on your profile, change your address and upload a picture of your new government issued id reflecting your new address and we will get your profile updated to ship to your new home.

settings.heading: How much does shipping cost?
settings.paragraph: Shipping is free and we will send you a pre-paid return shipping label as well.

settings.heading: I lost my return label, how do I print another?
settings.paragraph: No worries, just click here.

settings.heading: How do I know when to return my bag?
settings.paragraph: You will receive an alert 7 days prior to the date your bag needs to be returned by. You will have up 3 days to decide to keep the bag for an additional 30 days or start the return process. If you fail to notify us within the 3 day window, it will automatically renew the bag for an additional 30 days.

settings.heading: How do I start a return?
settings.paragraph: You will receive an email 7 days prior to the end of the rental period, from there click start my return and notify us that the bag is to be dropped off at your local_______(ups,fedex)store. We will receive a notification once the package has been scanned into their system.  We highly recommend that you retain your shipping receipts in case that shipping issues arise.

settings.heading: What happens if I damage an item?
settings.paragraph: You will be liable to bare the costs for the item to be repaired and for any downtime the item lost during the time it took to repair the damage.

settings.heading: Do you sell the bag accessories?
settings.paragraph: While we currently don't offer accessories for purchase, we plan on offering such luxury accessories in the near future, so check back with us soon!

settings.heading: How can I speak with a representative?
settings.paragraph: We have a business what’s app account to handle any of your LLS needs. Please find our number under the contact us tab.

settings.heading: Can I freeze my account?
settings.paragraph: We understand that life happens. As long as you currently don’t have any luxury items in your possession, You can freeze your account 1x per year for a maximum of 30 days.

settings.heading: How can I cancel my membership?
settings.paragraph: Once the membership period that you signed up for ends and as long as you no longer have an items in your possession, your account will automatically cancel.

settings.heading: ORDERS, SHIPPING, AND INSURANCE

settings.text: Explore our frequently asked questions MEMBERS@LOUERLESAC.COM
